QuestData.Title: A Poor Grasp of the Basics
QuestData.Description: Virmen - they no just eat our food. They trying to start farms of their own. The problem is... well, they ookin' dumb.$b$bYou no believe Muno? Last night, they break into tool sheds... steal equipment. When we wake up, we find rakes and wheelbarrows planted in ground.$b$bThey was WATERING them. They was trying to GROW WHEELBARROWS.$b$bPlease, while you out there, unbury our stuff.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks, friend. Now maybe a hozen can get some ookin' work done around here.
